about_the_game:
In ViCrew you build a crew of four Vikings which will go on raid missions for glory and fame.

Random generated ocean maps with many islands to explore await you.

Fight your way through tough enemies, level up your vikings and plunder everything you can see!

Turn-based Combat

Find the best strategy to defeat your enemies.

Random Generated

Every mission, map and enemy is random generated for replayability and variety.

Class-Based Characters

Five playable classes: Warrior, Archer, Druid, Seer, Bard.

Travel by Ship

Set sail and explore new islands.

Get Stronger!

Level your Vikings and get stronger to be ready for the hard missions.

Trade

Sell your loot to buy food and equipment for your crew.

Permadeath

When a Character dies, he will be gone forever.

content_descriptors.notes: Characters and Monsters will fight against each other with medieval weapons and magic. There will be blood and death but it is in an unrealistic low poly 3D art style.

short_description: ViCrew is a tactical RPG with turn based combat in which you build a crew of Vikings to go on glorious raids. Explore random generated maps and plunder as much as you can. Level your characters and get strong enough to beat the toughest enemies.
